data.title: The Governess
data.text:
We can be any self we want, can't we?

A beautiful, tempestuous young Jewish woman poses as a Christian governess to support her destitute family until a forbidden love affair reveals her true identity.

Starring:

Minnie Driver, Tom Wilkinson, Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Harriet Walter

Director:

Sandra Goldbacher

Producers:

Sarah Curtis

Screenplay:

Sandra Goldbacher

Executive Producers:

Sally Hibbin

Sales agent:

Pandora Cinema

Distributor:

Momentum Pictures

Credits summary:

Parallax Pictures presents with the participation of British Screen and the Arts Council of England in association with BBC Films and Pandora Cinema

Certificate:

15

Running time:

114 mins

Released:

10 July 1998

Out on DVD:

3 March 1999
